short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily accessible filters to narrow Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: While searching, sometimes you are looking for a more recent articles or something from a particular region or a particular language. You can do it using "Filters". This extension exposes the various search filtering options right on the search results page, making it much more accessible.
